story_message: You're a naughty boy going around opening chests and boxes that aren't yours. Let's make a deal. You help me seal the contents back inside my box and in exchange I will grant you the power of the stars.;But first, could you tell me your name little one?
Pleasure doing business with you. I do hope you have a map of this labyrinth. It really would be a shame if we got lost in here and met an unfortunate end. Perhaps we will even find some treasure.

I'm so glad to see you're still here in one piece. You may have to venture back into those ruins to acquire a weapon. There is a fortress nearby. I'd like you to steal something notable and come back. That should prove both your loyalty and ability.

I'm impressed with your findings. It would seem my celestial energy has been scattered and is mutating your world. Bring me any more stones you find that are infused with traces of my energy.;This should help me to regain my power.
You're not anywhere near strong enough yet. I can help you improve your equipment, but first you need to show me that you are qualified to use it.
Glad to see you can keep up on the ground, but is that also true for the skies? Astratha will bring the dragons upon your world. You'll need to acquire a pair of wings if you intend to contend.
Hopefully you got some wings refined. We've got more enemies inbound and they don't plan to wait around.
A False Paragon will be here soon and you're still not ready. Make sure to use all the resources at your disposal and get as strong as you can.
Aurora is nearby and commands a mobile fortress that threatens this world. We must put a stop to him and seal away his power.

The mortal plane is safe for now. Let's take this opportunity to improve your skills some more. Once you're ready we'll head into the fiends abyss. Remember this is a one way trip and there is no turning back.
The mortal plane faces danger yet again. I won't be of much assistance in combat anymore. Use the power I have granted to you and purge these horrors.
I sense Astratha is nearby. The dragons are an elemental blight that invade from the outer dimensions. They intend to tear open the gate between worlds. We will make our stand here.

I'm sorry… I've miscalculated. I did not think Tyra would be able to manifest in this plane. This is a disaster. If Tyra has come here then it's only a matter of time until the others make their move.
I'm impressed by how much you've grown. The True Paragons have not yet breached this dimension. Give me some time to prepare a plan. We will take the fight to them!
Remnants of Astratha's energy are still lingering. If we gather enough perhaps we can recreate his wings and use them to enter the celestial rifts.
quest_message: Equip a pair of Dimensional Wings

story_message: To my knowledge no human has ventured into the celestial plane before. This is an incredible accomplishment and you should be proud.;Prepare for battle, they know we are here now.
This is the power of a True Paragon. Claim it as your own and ascend to new heights. We can use their power against them.
We must continue to seal as many of the True Paragons as we can. If we cannot reclaim enough of my power before we meet one of the High Three then all is lost.
It is not an exaggeration to say that any one of the High Three can bring an end to all things. We cannot show them any weakness.
I will buy you the time you need. I hope the next time we meet you will be strong enough to save us all.
I couldn't stop them. You can't stop them. All is lost.;Please... while I'm still in control of myself. Kill me.

Thank you for saving me. From this point forward all my power is yours. Only the echo of my soul will remain to accompany you to the end.;I sincerely hope you can stop Oblivia and those who lie beyond the void. Farewell.
It is time. The void is an annihilator of all things. To conquer the power of a black hole is an impossibility. However, I trust that you can find a way.
To overcome destruction is a miracle. Now you must claim authority over creation.;Create a second miracle my child of the stars.
The existance of nothing and the annihalation of all things. Your creation of a twin miracle has awarded you sovereignty over the stars.;Ascend into divinity and face the finale.
I feel the fading of reality. Eleuia wishes for finality, but you can rewrite this world. Create the third miracle and harness the primeval atom.;Invert her wish for the end into a new beginning.

Our efforts were not in vain. I'm sure that even if you don't understand it you can feel the birth of a new existance. You have crossed lands, realms, dimensions, and realities. You can't go back anymore. Not to any of them.
You hunger for power and overflow with greed. You seek the control required to unweave fate and rewrite the True Laws. I believe in you.
I cannot take you beyond the stars, but take from me all that remains. It's up to you to transcend and break the cycle.
Even during your endless fight with the Eons you would still help me to seal the Paragon's essence and restore the planar order?
